entry.title: Cut and Run
entry.summary:
Author: Bubbling24

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 68,573Chapters: 13/?Kudos: 175

Summary: In a city like Gotham, information is currency. And you've made a career out of getting people to talk.Not by force. Not with threats. Just a salon chair, a mirror, and the kind of silence that makes people fill it with secrets. Affairs. Deals. Who’s moving into which block. Who’s gone missing. Who’s about to.You’re not a vigilante. You don’t wear a mask. You just know when something’s about to crack - and lately, Gotham’s been humming like a live wire.And you weren’t supposed to matter. Not to anyone.And especially not to the man who just blew up a bar because you said it gave you a bad feeling.

entry.title: The Way You See Me
entry.summary:
Author: Xivkyn

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 21,666Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 48

Summary: After being an experiment to Hugo Strange for the majority of your life you finally escape. The trauma of your time there follows you as you remember the screams and death all around you. You don't even know your own name as the number 'Seven' was the only semblance of a name you were given. You have no one to go home to and nothing you look forward to except for revenge. It consumes your every thought ever since you escaped. You want him to feel the pain he caused you and your friends.Limited y/n usage

entry.title: Hangman's Trick // J. Todd
entry.summary:
Author: themoonunderstandsmyneeds

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 12,924Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 4

Summary: They were the best of friends, the girl and the boy from the slums. Sleepovers, training sessions, reading together, playing board games, missions, secrets, traumas, movie nights, video games, there was little they didn't do together. Until he died. Sixteen years old and in the grave. Fourteen years old and lost in grief. Seven years have passed and it's time for Jason to finally pay her a visit. ( A/N: not the best summary but you get the point lol. don't expect this to be a comic accurate story. i will do my best to keep characters how they are represented in their media but i'm not holding myself to any particular story line. consider this an AU if you will. please check TW's. i will put chapter specific ones in the notes at the start of every chapter but for the first chapter i will try and cover all the potential triggers this story will cover. anyways, essentially this is a story where you are jason's childhood best friend, who isn't aware that he is alive. don't expect everything to make perfect sense, we will gain more backstory as we progress. enjoy xx.)

entry.title: Good Luck, Babe.
entry.summary:
Author: teklarn

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 10,974Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 38

Summary: Born as the heir to a dirty fortune and nothing more, since you could walk you’ve known you’d marry someone for the sake of carrying on your family’s legacy. Trying to find love was never forbidden―it was simply out of the question. There was no point in finding it when you were betrothed to a complete stranger. As the prized and only daughter of Roman Sionis, otherwise known as the infamous crime lord Black Mask, what choice was there to make?Mafia boss Bruce Wayne strikes a deal with your father―join your two incredibly powerful and wealthy families by marrying off the soul heirs. That would be you, and Bruce Wayne’s adopted ‘golden son,’ Richard Grayson.The first time you meet Dick, he’s nothing short of a typical rich kid. Polite in all the ways that mattered, a little arrogant and a little flashy for your taste, but cute nonetheless. But when you meet Dick’s bodyguard, Jason Todd―a reformed criminal paying off his debt to the Wayne’s―everything changes. Jason is handsome, aloof, dangerous, everything you aren’t allowed to have.And now, he’s suddenly everything you want.

entry.title: Ashes in the Rain
entry.summary:
Author: GunpowderHeart13 (PostTraumaticProse)

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,398Chapters: 5/5Kudos: 25

Summary: He’s never been good with words. So he lets his hands say what he can’t. He’s not sure why you keep letting him back in. Maybe you’re just as broken as him. Maybe that’s why it feels right.After a brutal night on the streets of Gotham, a wounded Jason Todd shows up at the reader's door, seeking refuge in the quiet safety they offer—a pattern that's become painfully familiar. As he recovers and disappears again for weeks, Jason finds himself haunted by the connection he's forming, even while working violent cases in the city's darkest corners. Between bloodied safehouses, hostage rescues, and near-death encounters, Jason begins to question whether he can trust someone with the truth of who he is—and whether there's still a part of him worth saving.

entry.title: Everybody Loves A Winner (So Nobody Loved Me)
entry.summary:
Author: Donnaez

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,385Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 32

Summary: “Is this why you hate me? Why you have been rude to me from day one? Simply because you were… jealous?” You inquired. Part of you was mad that the months’ worth of conflicts you had with Jason were, this whole time, funded by such an immature reason, but the other couldn’t help but want to comprehend the man in front of you and his many layers.“Oh, I wished it was just that.” He said with a bitter scoff. “The maddening part of all of it is that I don’t think I have ever hated someone who isn’t a villain so much.” He confessed, pinching the bridge of his nose. “You are condescending, arrogant and at the same time a bootlicker, you deny it, you pretend you’re independent without him, but we all know would shoot yourself in the face if Bruce asked you to. You’re everything I’m not, the opposite of me in every sense, yet every time I look at you, I can't help but feel my heart beating faster, all my blood going to my dick and suddenly I’m as hard as a brick.”--Or, you and Jason, unfortunately, are the only ones available to go investigate two politicians in a Gala at the mayor’s manor and you end up fucking in one of the guests’ rooms.
